propDescriptions.checkedIcon: The icon to display when the component is checked.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true, the accordion is displayed in a disabled state.
propDescriptions.disableRipple: If true, the ripple effect is disabled.
propDescriptions.icon: The icon to display when the component is unchecked.
propDescriptions.inputRef: Pass a ref to the input element.
propDescriptions.name: Name attribute of the input element.
propDescriptions.onChange:
Callback fired when the state is changed.

Signature:
function(event: object) => void
event: The event source of the callback. You can pull out the new value by accessing event.target.value (string). You can pull out the new checked state by accessing event.target.checked (boolean).
propDescriptions.size: The size of the radio. small is equivalent to the dense radio styling.
propDescriptions.sx: Die Einstellung, die das Definieren von Überschreibungen, sowie zusätzlichen CSS-Styles erlaubt. Weitere Details finden Sie auf der `sx` Seite.
propDescriptions.value: The value of the component. The DOM API casts this to a string.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
